title: Spicy African chilli steak soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons groundnut oil', '450g (1 lb) stewing steak or chicken, washed and diced', '2 red onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon ground root ginger', '3 Scotch bonnet chillies, seeded and finely chopped', '2 tomatoes, diced', '100g (4 oz) okra, diced', '500ml water']
